root.name: Motion Sports
root.description: MotionSports: Play for Real, first announced by Ubisoft at E3 2010, is a Kinect-exclusive multiplayer sports game for the Xbox 360. Unlike Wii Sports or Kinect Sports, MotionSports has a more realistic graphical look and does not feature player avatars like many other Kinect titles do. Playable sports include football, soccer, skiing, boxing, horseback riding, and hang gliding. MotionSports also adds new interactive elements to each sport. For example, during the skiing game, you can throw snow balls at your opponents to slow them down.
